txt.en: 'Good! This gives me plenty to experiment with.'
There is an avanc nesting ground in the Wadewater west of Lhan Garan named Fangsettle.\n\nSlay avanc near Fangsettle.
Culhuc is curious if avanc would make a good food source.

'As you know, there's a risk we may not have enough food to last winter. There's a healthy population of avanc out in the Wadewater. I'm sure if cooked properly, they might taste good. How are your butchering skills?'
Culhuc is tending the community oven in Lhan Garan.\n\nTalk to Culhuc.
